meanings.definition: A type of closely woven cotton fabric.
meanings.sent1: I love the soft feel of percales against my skin.
meanings.sent2: My mom bought new percales for our bedsheets.
meanings.sent3: The percales whispered secrets to the silk sheets.
meanings.sent4: The percales hugged me like a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The percales shimmered in the sunlight, inviting me to touch them.

meanings.definition: Sheets or clothing made from percale fabric.
meanings.sent1: I sleep better on percales than any other sheets.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite nightgown was made of percales.
meanings.sent3: The percales danced in the wind on the clothesline.
meanings.sent4: His percales were a shield against the cold night.
meanings.sent5: The percales crinkled softly as she folded them neatly.
